title: Song of the Spring Breeze

tokens.lyric: Snow and cold wind of the bitter dark night,

lines.raw: [C]Snow and cold wind of the bitter dark night,

tokens.lyric: Lift off the weight of your

lines.raw: [F]Lift off the weight of your [C]cold ruthless hand;
[C]Spring breeze will [G7]chase you and [Am]bring flowery fragrances,

tokens.lyric: Though you most ruthless of winter winds blow,

lines.raw: Though you most ruthless of winter winds blow,

tokens.lyric: Doomed in a moment you too shall be calmed;

lines.raw: Doomed in a moment you too shall be calmed;

tokens.lyric: Butterfly awake and you meadow lark of spring,

lines.raw: Butterfly awake and you meadow lark of spring,

tokens.lyric: Our land has suffered this nightmare too long;

lines.raw: Our land has suffered this nightmare too long;
